eaa7b541-a95b-4e0c-8771-ff3850352e38.name: Combat Reflexes
eaa7b541-a95b-4e0c-8771-ff3850352e38.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

7624f228-b658-455a-b4ca-6fabd31ee9fe.name: Normal
7624f228-b658-455a-b4ca-6fabd31ee9fe.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

49c5ee8e-cbe3-4a8d-92ef-af35cece0aee.name: Very
49c5ee8e-cbe3-4a8d-92ef-af35cece0aee.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

45ebf34f-f762-46d8-afe2-6cd6b6794241.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
45ebf34f-f762-46d8-afe2-6cd6b6794241.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

473abe32-8e50-4e25-9b6b-02e717586e7b.name: Weapon Bond
473abe32-8e50-4e25-9b6b-02e717586e7b.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

d90a8bca-a3ff-4410-9070-530b155bc564.name: High Pain Threshold
d90a8bca-a3ff-4410-9070-530b155bc564.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

dd5cdd70-b214-4938-af52-f4ebbb1646e0.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

7a12b40a-fd80-4adf-8100-b6dc086219e9.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

b711e1cf-7c7f-45e4-95c1-4888439b8d8f.name: Legal Enforcement Powers (@Federal or Secret Service@)

ed83ee55-68c6-457b-8caf-5a9796dc7856.name: Luck, Extraordinary
ed83ee55-68c6-457b-8caf-5a9796dc7856.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

7971b760-9c2b-4871-ad42-fb0538cf3256.name: Easy to Hit
7971b760-9c2b-4871-ad42-fb0538cf3256.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

cfe6f207-a07d-4813-a112-33d550df6cd1.name: Gunslinger
cfe6f207-a07d-4813-a112-33d550df6cd1.notes: No Bulk penalties; half Fast-Draw (Ammo) penalties; ignore Spraying Fire (p. B409)

32496716-644d-4f9d-a690-84e02aae6a02.name: Luck
32496716-644d-4f9d-a690-84e02aae6a02.notes: Usable once per hour of play

55f7458d-cd18-43f9-8029-624560a10094.name: Intolerance (@Rival nation or other large group@)

e2d44609-20df-410a-877c-aedc325914c8.name: Judo
e2d44609-20df-410a-877c-aedc325914c8.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

73ad5865-c056-4844-9c5c-b3c23f8903f7.name: Choose 18 points
73ad5865-c056-4844-9c5c-b3c23f8903f7.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

8caa5b65-0098-4c0d-aa5a-f1a3caf42b93.name: Intelligence
8caa5b65-0098-4c0d-aa5a-f1a3caf42b93.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

ff2efed3-18d3-48fb-9425-03af43e0f57e.name: Choose 16 points
ff2efed3-18d3-48fb-9425-03af43e0f57e.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

dfdf5c93-58cc-4d4b-8637-9b8efa1251d9.name: Choose 18 points
dfdf5c93-58cc-4d4b-8637-9b8efa1251d9.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

a4944c30-a7f7-4b29-881a-32336952cc59.name: Security
a4944c30-a7f7-4b29-881a-32336952cc59.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.
